name: .BCA
summary: Learn about .BCA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a BCA file in Jetico BCArchive (Windows). To do so, select Archive â†’ Open from the program's menu bar. Then, navigate to and select your BCA file. Remember, you must know the password or public key used to create your BCA file in order to open the file.
